# Td Cube Add
<!--
@name: Td Cube Add
@description: Create a 3D cube and add it to the Parent object.
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->

Create a 3D cube and add it to the Parent object.

<b>Syntax</b>
```basic
Td Cube Add ObjectName$ = "wall1", ParentName$ = "scene", Image$ = "brick", Size# = 2.0
```

## Parameters

- **ObjectName&dollar;**: Name of the new Cube object
- **ParentName&dollar;**: Name of the parent object to which the new cube will be added.
- _Image&dollar;_ (optional): Name of the image that will be used as texture
- _Size#_ (optional): TSize of the object. If not specified, 1.0 is used by default.
- _Color&dollar;_ (optional): HTML color used for the object. If not specified, "#FFFFFF" is used by default.
- _RepX_ (optional): Repetition of the texture in the X axis. 1 by default.
- _RepY_ (optional): Repetition of the texture in the Y axis. 1 by default
---
<p align="center"><img valign="middle" width="76px" src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/en/image001.png" /></p>
